pages.text: Reminders for the info on the $(thing)Welcome to Bliss$() screen follow. Know that mobs...$(br)$(li)Won't attack you unless attacked first.$(li)Won't spawn in any blocks with direct view to the sky, except in thunderstorms.$(li)Won't grief your world in harmful ways (creepers, endermen, etc).

Additional tweaks to the game include...$(br)$(li)$(thing)Villagers$() are guaranteed to convert to $(thing)Zombie Villagers$() in $(item)Normal$() difficulty.$(li)$(thing)Spiders$() do not spawn, and all $(thing)Spider Spawners$() are replaced with $(thing)Creeper Spawners$() ($(thing)Cave Spider Spawners$() still show up).$(li)$(thing)Fire Spread$() is disabled.$(li)$(thing)Pillager Patrols$() are disabled.

If you want to be mostly relaxed, but still have a challenge, try finding a $(item)Bastion$(), $(item)Woodland Mansion$(), or $(item)Pillager Outpost$().$(br2)These structures are considered $(thing)guarded$(), and as such, the mobs inside will still aggro!$(br2)Upon entering each for the first time, you'll be reminded, so don't worry too much about it.

Lastly, your gameplay style can be tweaked to your liking by changing your game's difficulty.$(br2)In $(li)Easy$(), guarded structures no longer create aggro.$(li)In $(thing)Hard$(), mobs regain their ability to aggro naturally.
